termination_clause.text: TERMINATION   a. Except as provided in this Section 8, this Agreement shall terminate immediately upon the earlier of (i) the Term of this Agreement or (ii) dissolving of Company and/or Company's complete cessation of doing all business.   b. Either party shall have the right to terminate this Agreement immediately in the event that Talent or the Company does any of the following:   i. Engages in illegal, immoral, or criminal conduct resulting in a felony conviction;   ii. Misrepresents or conceals anything in their background that could be detrimental to the value of the endorsement being made;   iii. Engages in conduct contrary to the best interests of the other party;   iv. Engages in conduct that reasonably offends the sensitivities of a significant portion of the population; or   v.
